input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using item keywords and item name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Item name:
Beverage Air 501-137B Evaporator Motor .2 Amps 115-60 BOM

Item keywords:
Genuine OEM replacement part

Beverage Air offers industry leading quality in commercial refrigeration equipment designed for the food service industry

Use genuine OEM parts for safety reliability and performance

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
beverage-air offers industry-leading quality in commercial refrigeration equipment designed for the food service industry. We are a genuine OEM replacement part. When your original Equipment Manufacturer (E.M.) no longer produces the particular model of a piece of equipment that you need, our parts provide a reliable, cost-effective solution. 

Beverage Air 501-137B Evaporator Motor .2 Amps 115-60 BOM is a genuine OEM replacement part. Use genuine OEM parts for safety, reliability, and performance.
input_text.Response B:
Buck 174 Mayo CutbackTM, Frame Lock Folding Knife is a great knife for those who demand the very best. The 3-1/4" 420HC titanium-coated stainless steel drop point blade has a plain edge and a partial serration. The handle has a durable titanium coating with lightening holes along its length and comes in a titanium-coated stainless steel frame. The knife includes a stainless steel belt clip for easy carry, a box, and a Warranty Registration Card.

Buck's 4-Ever Unconditional Lifetime Warranty

About Buck Knives:
Since its beginning in 1965, Buck Knives has been a family-owned and operated company. Buck's initial success can be attributed to the creation of the world's first lockback folding knife, the Buck Ryan, which was designed by Al Buck. Since then, the company has produced a wide variety of knives for both the hunting and outdoor pursuits, as well as for military and law enforcement applications. Today, Buck Knives is one of the most respected names in the knife industry and continues to produce innovative, high-quality knives.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
